text:
Question 165) In one of his trips, a tourist bought a memory of one of the monuments he visited. At the base of the object there is information saying that it is a 1: 400 scale part, and that its volume is 25 cm3.
The volume of the original monument, in cubic meter, is
A) 100.
B) 400.
C) 1 600.
D) 6 250.
E) 10 000.
